But instead of delivering on any of these\, developers now do everything they can to impose a fanatical\, narrow-minded political point of view on their captive audience by hijacking beloved entertainment media that were once used to either just entertain or provoke thoughts and ideas interesting to anyone(!)\, no matter their personal Weltanschauung. And for the love of God\, never\, ever disrespect game characters and your own fan base like this!
